elementSpec.desc: contains the heading for the label or term column in a glossary list or similar structured list.

exemplum.egXML:
The simple, straightforward statement of an idea is preferable to the use of a worn-out expression.
TRITE SIMPLE, STRAIGHTFORWARD bury the hatchet
stop fighting, make peace at loose ends
disorganized on speaking terms
friendly fair and square
completely honest at death's door
near death

remarks.p: The headLabel element may appear only if each item in the list is preceded by a label.
